1433330.name: Happy's Humble Burger Farm Alpha
1433330.description:
This is a playable teaser


The Award Winning burger simulation is back, and tastier than ever! Return to Happy's Humble in the newest iteration of the Happy's Humble fast food franchises, Happy's Humble Burger Farm! You're tasked with maintaining a restaurant and finding the meaning of life itself!

Get a Job!

Featuring an even toastier State-of-the-Art Burger Chef Simulation, That'll get you movin' and groovin' as you're slinging patties like an absolute Burger Boss. You'll be required to tend to customers and manage the entire restaurant, and above all keep things running smoothly. We pride ourselves on a 3 infraction policy. So just don't mess up, and everything will be just fine...

Make Burgers!

Fling burgers, slap cheese, fill drinks and deep fry it all! We've expanded our menu beyond your wildest dreams. A refined menu prepared in the cleanest of facilities, where we never drop food on the ground and serve it to you.

You'll find yourself making:
  • Our Patented Happy's Deluxe
  • The Fantastic Fowl Sandwich
  • The Poppin' Pork Sandwich
  • 5 flavors of Soft Drinks
  • The Famous Strawberry Jacuzzi Shake
  • Hot Fries
  • Salmon Nuggets (New & Improved!)

Manage all of it!

It's not all about what's cookin', good lookin'. You need to make sure things are up to par and maintain our Humble Hygiene Code of Ethics, which is lawyer talk for "please wash your hands". You never know what can happen at the finest restaurant establishment in the world, be prepared to unclog toilets, accept deliveries, throw away trash, and more.
1433330.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

highlighted.name: And A Thing That Tells Time
